question: Which among the following definition is nearest to the Gross Budgetary Support?
option1: value of gross revenue receipts by the government
option3: Fraction of total expenditure of the government on different Central sectors plans
option4: Fraction of total expenditure of the government on different Central sectors/ ministries/departments and the support to State/Union Territory Plan
answer: Fraction of total expenditure of the government on different Central sectors/ ministries/departments and the support to State/Union Territory Plan
